snippet: The five classically trained but comic members of the Spaghetti Western Orchestra, an act that devotes their humor-filled shows to Ennio Morricone, is playing in London this week.
abstract: The five classically trained but comic members of the Spaghetti Western Orchestra, an act that devotes their humor-filled shows to Ennio Morricone, is playing in London this week.

headline.main: Ennio Morricone's Music Gets Comic Treatment in London
